levels.description: Equipped Operator will be considered part of the [Karlan Trade] faction; when dealing damage, there is a <@ba.vup>50%</> chance to inflict <@ba.vup>1</>s of Cold; when there are at least <@ba.vup>3</> [Karlan Trade] Operators on the field, all [Karlan Trade] Operators gain this effect; when there are at least <@ba.vup>6</> [Karlan Trade] Operators on the field, all [Karlan Trade] Operators deal <@ba.vup>120%</> more damage to Frozen enemies
